description: This shirt's oxford fabric is custom-developed by Ralph Lauren in collaboration with a storied Italian mill. Utilizing an innovative treatment, artisans infuse pure cotton with lasting stretch qualities while maintaining natural attributes such as breathability and a durable structure.
fitting_details: Size 15½ has a 31½" back body length, an 18¾" shoulder, a 43" chest, and a 35½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
Pleated back yoke ensures smooth, contoured shoulders.
Model is 6'1"/185 cm and wears a size 15½.
